Description: Stores information about the bank accounts that exist within the bank, including a unique account number(ACCOUNT_NUMBER), CATEGORY (saving, current,etc),transaction dates, CUSTOMER NUMBER,OPENING DATES AND MORE.
Contains details of each customer of the bank, including CUSTOMER_NO(CUSTOMER NUMBER), names, type of customer, joining date, birth date and more demographic features..

This table captures detailed records of customer transactions made through digital channels. Each entry represents an individual transaction, including information about the customer, transaction type, and financial details.
